text: qal almshrkwn: atakhadh allah wldana, kqwlhm: almalayikat banat allh, 'aw almasih abn allh. tqddas allah ean dhlk klh wtnzzah, hu alghaniu ean kl ma swah, lah kl ma fi alsmwat walard, fkyf yakun lah walad miman khalaq wakulu shay' mmlwk lh? walays ldykm dalil ealaa ma tftrwnh min alkdhb, 'ataqulun ealaa allah ma la taelamun haqiqatah wshth?
